item.title: Ansible Error: sudo not valid attribute for Play
item.description: If you see an error such as this: ERROR! 'sudo' is not a valid attribute for a Play You need to replace: sudo: yes with become:true See https://stackoverflow.com/questions/60162859/error-sudo-is-not-a-valid-attribute-for-a-play
